DOC.brief_summary: Prior research indicate link early lead exposure risk delinquent behavior . In study , follow large birth cohort Cincinnati Lead Study early adulthood determine whether increase risk persists . Outcome measure include official arrest record , diagnose Substance Abuse Disorder Antisocial Personality Disorder , self-report delinquent behavior , psychopathy scale . Predictors include pre-natal post-natal blood lead level . Multivariate statistical method control potential confounders/covariates .
DOC.brief_title: Early Exposure Lead Adult Antisocial Outcomes
DOC.criteria: ( 1 ) Part original CLS birth cohort ( 1 ) Moved geographic area
